content.query:
-- All steps for dedicated SQL pool


-- USE udacitytemp
-- GO

-- Use the same file format as used for creating the External Tables during the LOAD step.
-- IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
-- CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
-- WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
-- FORMAT_OPTIONS (
-- FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
-- USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
-- ))
-- GO

-- Create master key
-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [NYC_Payroll_Summary_DEDICATED]
-- GO
-- DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL nyc_payroll
-- GO
-- DROP MASTER KEY 
-- GO
-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'udacity_pw_001'

-- CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL nyc_payroll_DEDICATED
-- WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
-- SECRET = 'sp=r&st=2024-03-12T16:36:20Z&se=2024-03-13T00:36:20Z&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=c&sig=hRJ1EgNHRhwC64nGaALIJo9p4GUUxuNnqfybM6lYuxU%3D'
-- GO

-- The above seems to have worked, but the following results in:
-- "External access operation failed because the location URI is invalid. Revise the URI and try again."

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [NYC_Payroll_Summary_DEDICATED]
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [NYC_Payroll_Summary_DEDICATED] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://udacitynycpayrollthomasm.blob.core.windows.net/udacity-nycpayroll-thomas-m',
    https://udacitynycpayrollthomasm.blob.core.windows.net/udacity-nycpayroll-thomas-m
	CREDENTIAL = nyc_payroll_DEDICATED
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Summary_DEDICATED](
    [FiscalYear] [int] NULL,
    [AgencyName] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TotalPaid] [float] NULL
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/dirstaging',
    DATA_SOURCE = [NYC_Payroll_Summary_DEDICATED],
    FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
    )
GO
